Definition at line 40 of file DataSource.h.

typedef void(* NITF_IDATASOURCE_SET_SIZE)(NITF_DATA *, nitf_Off size)

Set the size of the data source. (NITRO 2.0). This is useful when we want to stream a file into our NITF. That way our user does not have to write his/her own file source.
